entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow at times this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Blowing snow at times late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
